example.name: just transitive
example.text: The company said it amended its shareholder rights plan by reducing to 10% from 20% the level of ownership by an outsider that would trigger the issuance to other holders of rights to buy additional shares of Nashua common at half price.
example.arg: by reducing to 10% from 20% the level of ownership by an outsider that would trigger the issuance to other holders of rights to buy additional shares of Nashua common at half price

example.name: with secondary predication
example.text: PS of New Hampshire amended its plan to call for two years of 5.5% rate increases followed by five years of 4.5% increases.
example.arg: to call for two years of 5.5% rate increases followed by five years of 4.5% increases
example.note: I read the following sentence as the plan now calls for such-and-such increases, not that PS amended its plan in order to call for the increases. It's subtle.
